detail_desc: Short-sleeved, printed jersey top.
Fine-knit, ribbed leggings in a soft cotton blend with elastic containing glittery threads at the waist and hems.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Gently bell-shaped skirt with an asymmetric hem.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Loose-fitting top in soft jersey with a motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved, short dress in sturdy, patterned jersey. The dress is fitted at the top and has a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit top in a soft, printed viscose blend with an unlined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a decorative drawstring with a tie at the hem.
Top in soft jersey with sequined embroidery on the front and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in jersey with a burnout pattern and seam at the hem with a wide flounce.
Short-sleeved top in slub jersey with a print motif, cap sleeves and a tie at the hem.
Flared tulle skirt with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Vest top in soft jersey with a yoke at the front.
Vest top in soft jersey with a yoke at the front.
Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative, sewn-on bow at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Satin trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a decorative, sewn-on bow at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short dress in a viscose weave with small, frilled sleeves, a collar and buttons at the top. Inset lace trims at the front and waist.and flared skirt with a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in a viscose weave with small, frilled sleeves, a collar and buttons at the top. Inset lace trims at the front and waist.and flared skirt with a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative pompoms on the front.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative pompoms on the front.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative pompoms on the front.
Slippers with a concealed elastic trim around the top. Terry linings and insoles and soft imitation suede soles.

Short off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Frill around the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and a seam at the hem with narrow elastic and a frill trim.
Lace choker with an adjustable metal fastener. Adjustable length, 30-37 cm.
Pull-on shorts in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Ribbed top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small ribbed stand-up collar. Narrow cut at the top and frills around the armholes.
Ribbed top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small ribbed stand-up collar. Narrow cut at the top and frills around the armholes.

Soft, non-wired triangle bra in lace with decorative straps at the front and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow elastic hem with a fastening at the back.

Sleeveless playsuit in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and concealed press-studs at the top. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, side pockets and back pockets. Drawstring at the waist and short legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Chinos in cotton twill with side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button. Adjustable waist and a fake fly with a decorative button.
Block-coloured sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and reflective details.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and a heavily draping flared skirt. Jersey lining to the knees.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside, elastication and a concealed drawstring waist, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a brushed thermal inside, elastication and a concealed drawstring waist, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.

Parka with a ribbed stand-up collar, detachable jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and drawstring at the waist. Flap front pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket, ribbed cuffs and a rounded back with a vent. Jersey lining.
Leggings in printed jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Slight V-neck and ventilating mesh sides.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long sleeves, a visible seam at the back and raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lace bralette with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Non-wired push-up bra top in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
